Package guru.mikelue.jdut.vendor

This package defines the Vendors, which is used to discriminate vendor-specific funcdtions.

Type enumration of vendor

DatabaseVendor defines the value of enumeration for pre-defined databases, which implements VendorType.

Choose vendor by DatabaseMetaData

You could check DatabaseVendor.getVendor(java.sql.DatabaseMetaData) for build-in selection engine for vendor.

Vendor specific implementation

The specific vendor implementations are put into "guru.mikelue.jdut.vendor.<DatabaseName>"
Naming for databases:
  • oracle - Oracle DBMS
  • massql - MS SQL Server DBMS
  • mysql - MySql DBMS
  • postgresql - PostgreSql DBMS
  • derby - Derby Database
  • h2 - H2 Database
  • hsqldb - HSQLDB Database
  • sqlite - Sqlite Database
  • Interface Summary 
    Interface Description
    VendorType
    The interface to represent type of vendor.
  • Enum Summary 
    Enum Description
    DatabaseVendor
    The defined vendors of database.
